means: 夸张的行动或形象，小题大做

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"产品，制品"之意。
means: manufacture ： 一般指机器大量制造的产品。
produce ： 多指农产品(尤指蔬菜水果等)。
product ： 一般指工业产品，也可泛指各种各样的产品。
production ： 含义广泛，不同场合有不同的意思，可表示"产品，产物"，尤指人类智力或艺术劳动的产品。

sentence.Network_en: Their first car rolls off the production line on December 16.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的第一辆车于12月16日下线。

sentence.Network_en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentence.Network_cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentence.Network_en: Hydrogen is used extensively in industry for the production of ammonia.
sentence.Network_cn: 氢气在工业上广泛用于制氨。

list.abs: ◆ 广义产品(Generalized Product)，使用的是基于ISO9000:2000《质量管理系统————基础和术语》(Quality Management System Standards —— Fundamentals and vocabulary)3.4.1“过程(process)“定义和2.4.2“产品(product)“定义的哲理级抽象概念：一组将输入转化为输出的相互关联或相互作用的活动的结果.一些典型的广义产品实例.
广西华美纸业集团有限公司 ... 走进华美 ABOUT US 产品展示 PRODUCTS 华美新闻 NEWS.
制字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 制冷〖 refrigeration〗 制品〖 goods;products〗 制售〖 makeandsell〗.
But to develop manufactures to the utmost, China must have new markets for her products.不过, 中国若极大地发展制造业就必须拥有销售其产品的新市场.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... productive a 生产的；多产的 productivity n 生产力，生产活动 reduce v 降低，减少.

jx.jx_en_mean: do (something) in an unnecessarily elaborate or complicated way
jx.jx_cn_mean: 对…作不必要的发挥； 对…小题大做

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin productio(n-), from producere 'bring forth' (see produce)

entry.def: Production is the process of manufacturing or growing something in large quantities.

example.ex: That model won't go into production before late 1990.
example.tran: 那种型号在20世纪90年代末以前不会批量生产。

example.ex: ...tax incentives to encourage domestic production of oil.
example.tran: 鼓励国内石油生产的税收优惠政策

entry.def: Production is the amount of goods manufactured or grown by a company or country.

example.ex: We needed to increase the volume of production...
It expected to maintain production of cars at the same level as last year.
example.tran: 预期今年汽车的产量会和去年持平。

entry.def: The production of something is its creation as the result of a natural process.

example.ex: These proteins stimulate the production of blood cells.
example.tran: 这些蛋白质会刺激血细胞的产生。

entry.tran: （戏剧的）排演；（电影、电视节目的）制作；（唱片的）灌制
entry.def: Production is the process of organizing and preparing a play, film, programme, or CD, in order to present it to the public.

example.ex: During the film's production, the director wanted to shoot a riot scene but the filming was blocked...
example.tran: 在影片摄制期间，导演想拍摄一个暴乱场面，但是被禁止了。

example.ex: She is head of the production company.
example.tran: 她是制片公司的负责人。

entry.def: A production is a play, opera, or other show that is performed in a theatre.

example.ex: For this production she has learnt the role in Spanish.
example.tran: 为了这次演出，她已经学会了用西班牙语演这个角色。

entry.tran: 通过出示；通过展示；通过亮出
entry.def: When you can do something on production of or on the production of documents, you need to show someone those documents in order to be able to do that thing.

example.ex: Entry to the show is free to members on production of their membership cards.
example.tran: 会员只要出示会员卡就可以免费观看演出。

means.word_mean: 1. (economics) manufacturing or mining or growing something (usually in large quantities) for sale;

sentences.sentence: "he introduced more efficient methods of production"

means.word_mean: 2. a presentation for the stage or screen or radio or television;

sentences.sentence: "have you seen the new production of Hamlet?"

means.word_mean: 3. the act or process of producing something;
4. an artifact that has been created by someone or some process;

sentences.sentence: "they export most of their agricultural production"

means.word_mean: 5. (law) the act of exhibiting in a court of law;

sentences.sentence: "the appellate court demanded the production of all documents"

means.word_mean: 6. the quantity of something (as a commodity) that is created (usually within a given period of time);

sentences.sentence: "production was up in the second quarter"

means.word_mean: 7. a display that is exaggerated or unduly complicated;

sentences.sentence: "she tends to make a big production out of nothing"

means.word_mean: 8. the creation of value or wealth by producing goods and services

auth_sentence.content: The second, Zaat, is currently under production.
auth_sentence.res_content: The second, Zaat, is currently under production.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The second, Zaat, is currently under production.

auth_sentence.content: There's no slacking on the production front either.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's no slacking on the production front either.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's no slacking on the production front either.

auth_sentence.content: It is a Century Films production for the BBC.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a Century Films production for the BBC.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a Century Films production for the BBC.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"某种物,用品;人等"; 2. 表名词,"动作或状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: accord和谐+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.手风琴
carr=carn肉+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.腐肉
champ+ion人→n.冠军,拥护者,战士
cush垫+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.垫子,软垫
manse住宅+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.大厦,大楼;宅第
product产品+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.生产,产品,作品
scorp原意为一种鱼,后指蝎子+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.蝎子
dismiss解散;开除+ion动作或状态等→n.免职,解雇,不予考虑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 允许进入,承认某事之陈述,供认
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+miss送+ion动作或状态等→送来→许可进入
concise简明的+ion动作或状态等→n.简明,简洁
console安慰+at+ion动作或状态等→n.安慰,慰藉
contradict反驳,矛盾+ion动作或状态等→n.反驳,矛盾
create创造+ion动作或状态等→n.创造,创作物
dilapidate倒塌+ion动作或状态等→n.破旧,荒废

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
stems_affixes.word_buile: discriminate歧视+ion动作或状态等→n.辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
discuss讨论+ion动作或状态等→n.讨论,谈论;论述
edit编辑+ion状态→在以前的基础编辑后→版本,版
expanse膨胀扩张+ion动作或状态等→n.扩张,膨胀;张开,伸展
frict摩擦+ion动作或状态等→n.摩擦,摩擦力
lucubrate用功,深入研究+ion动作或状态等→n.刻苦研究

stems_affixes.value_cn: 航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
stems_affixes.word_buile: navigate航行,航海,导航+ion动作或状态等→n.航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
obligate有责任的+ion动作或状态等→n.义务,责任
obsess迷住,使困扰+ion动作或状态等→n.迷住,困扰
pollute弄脏,污染+ion动作或状态等→污染,玷污

stems_affixes.value_cn: 持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: possess占有,拥有+ion动作或状态等→n.持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[n.]财产,财富
receipt收据,收到+ion动作或状态等→n.接待,招待会,接收
situate使处于+ion动作或状态等→n.情形,境遇

Sentence.sentence: Vast areas of the United States are off-limits to oil exploration and production in the name of environmental protection.
To what extent are Americans really willing to endure the environmental impacts of domestic energy production in order to cut back imports
It allows for economic efficiency, and when we buy things from places that have lower production costs than we do, we benefit.
When the Ford Motor Company, for example, recently announced that it was bringing some production home, the White House cheered.

When you see things like Ford moving new production from Mexico to Detroit, instead of the other way around, you know things are changing," says Gene Sperling, director of the National Economic Council
How did the White House respond to Ford's announcement to bring some production

means.word_mean: 生产, 制作; 产量

sentences.en: It plays an important role in developing production.
sentences.cn: 它在发展生产中起着重要作用。

sentences.en: We are aiming at a higher production level.
sentences.cn: 我们旨在提高生产水平。

sentences.en: I read this writer's early productions.
sentences.cn: 我读过这位作家的早期作品。

sentences.en: Entrance is permitted only on production of a ticket.

jushi.english: If the plant's rules and regulations collapsed, production would get into a mess.
jushi.chinese: 如果厂里的规章制度失效了,生产就要陷入混乱。

jushi.english: It was the greatest production of Hamlet that this country has seen and heard.
jushi.chinese: 这是该国所能看到和听到的《哈姆雷特》最盛大的演出。

jushi.english: Washington annually leads the nation in lumber production.
jushi.chinese: 华盛顿每年的木材生产都居全国之首。
